summary: Defines the FastPitchModel class that implements the FastPitch text‑to‑speech architecture. The model orchestrates configuration handling, data preprocessing, tokenization, feature normalization, training and validation loops, inference generation of mel‑spectrograms, and utilities for exporting and deploying the model within the NeMo framework.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to build, train, and deploy high‑quality neural TTS systems that convert text into natural‑sounding speech by leveraging the FastPitch architecture.
